title: Executive Order 5564-Power-Site Restoration No. 460, Oregon
content: So much of the order of November 24, 1916, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 566 as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 1 S., R. 19 E., Sec. 9, SE ¼ SE ¼;
Sec. 10, lots 1 and 2, SW ¼ NW ¼, W ½ SW ¼, E ½ SE ¼;
Sec. 11, lots 3 and 4, NW ¼ SW ¼;
T. 2 N., R. 18 E., Sec. 12, lots 10 and 11.
T. 1 N., R. 19 E., Sec. 24, SW ¼ SE ¼.

So much of the orders of May 19, 1910, creating Temporary Power-Site Reserve No. 145 and of July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 145 as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 1 S., R. 20 E., Sec. 7, SE ¼ NE ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5564-Power-Site Restoration No. 460, Oregon Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361357
